reviewtext: With all the items I have to hook up online, there is just not enough room on a router to hook everything up.This is where this great switch comes in to action. With a jumper wire from the router to the switch, I can then add all my other data line hook ups with out loosing any power or speed.Who ever thought of this is a genius!If you find your self running out of room to hook things up, this is your answer.
